page.title: 16EVERYDAY LIFE OF A CHILD.
page.content: {ALISON SHORT,AGE 10.} On Thursday morning I wake at 7-45.I dress,go downstairs and get my break- fast of cereal,a cup of tea and a bis- cuit.Iwatch T.V.and read before I get my bag ready for school.Dad starts the car and I jump in and go to school.At 8-30 we arrive.I play for 1/2 an hour before the bell rings.We do maths un- til 10-30,which is play-time,then Eng- lish until dinner time.After dinner,we come in at 1-15 and do art.At 2-20 we have 15 minutes play,then we go swim- ming.We return to school at 3-45,when it is time to walk home with my friend Kelly.When I get home,tea is ready,and after tea I go and call for Kelly.We play ball games and run about.At 5-45 I come in to get ready for jazz-band practice from 6-00 to 7-30.Dad brings me home,I bath and wash my hair and read until bed time at 9-00 p.m.
